original_text: You multiplied your whoring also with the trading land of Chaldea, and even with this you were not satisfied.
korean_text: 장사하는 땅 갈대아에까지 심히 행음하되 아직도 족한 줄을 알지 못하였느니라

sentences.original_text: You multiplied your whoring also with the trading land of Chaldea
sentences.korean_translation: 또한 갈대아 상업의 땅과 더불어 네 행음을 늘렸으며

sentences.original_text: and even with this you were not satisfied.
